title: Obsidian
description: My home server, which runs various services, hosts network storage and provides monitoring tools. Service containers are managed with Proxmox, Docker and LXC. Most configuration is done through docker-compose, the configuration files for which I keep hosted on GitHub.

title: pyreminder
description: Pyreminder is a dead-simple tool for checking release statuses and sending notifications. The pyreminder repo makes use of GitHub Actions to automatically build and deploy docker images to Docker Hub.

title: This Site
description: This is a full-stack website, hosted on a vps. It is built with Angular and Flask, all wrapped up in a Docker-Compose stack.

title: Ascii-Art
description: Generates ascii (and unicode) art from images.

title: CommentCounter
description: A Reddit bot that counts comments based on the occurrences of given words.
